refnamediv.refpurpose: Getting in touch and writing code

refsect2.title: Contacting the Developer
refsect2.para: I (Steve) can be found most of the times on the Freenode IRC channel #wayland-security or on the GIMP.net IRC channel #gnome-design, albeit not affiliated with those projects. Feel free to message me in private, too.
You can email me at s.dodier-lazaro@cs.ucl.ac.uk. This is a very good way of getting in touch if you want to contribute!

I will usually post news about Sandbox Utils on the GNOME Desktop Devel mailing list, as most of the people interested in app sandboxing are affiliated with GNOME. Make sure to subscribe to receive announcements or join ongoing discussions.
